title: Recurring Message-- (Insert friend here) has opened their gift!
body:
I sent one of my friends a mystery gift a few days ago, and since then every time I log in I get a notification popup saying that they've opened their gift. It's starting to annoy me, and I don't even understand why it's happening. I sent several other people gifts, yet the popup only appears for one friend. 

I'm not sure if I'm just missing a simple fix, or if I'm going to have to do something more complicated. Help on this would be appreciated!

replies.body:
Ok I think I've got it!  Once opening the client, look for the bell in the upper-right near summoner name and status:  this should have a small circle overlapping it, which is the new client's way of saying, "you have new notifications."  If you click the bell, you will see all these "friend opened gift" items.  Clicking the x on each item will remove it from your notification log and stop it from recurring at each boot.

(you're welcome!)

Is this happening in the Beta Client or Legacy Client? You may want to swap over to the Client you aren't currently using (Legacy can be accessed from the login screen, button at bottom) so we can see if dismissing the notification on another platform resolves this.

Please let me know if that did anything for ya.
This discussion is from 8 months ago and this bug is still not fixed. The bug is still happening to me i send a gift 2 weeks ago and it still shwos up everytime I log on.

I was having the same problem, and switching to the legacy client to dismiss the notification did work to get rid of it, so it definitely seems like a bug with the new client.

This is still happening for me as well.  It sort of disincentivizes me to make further purchases/gifts because it's so annoying (the pop-ups cover other functional areas of the client - closing out eight pop-ups per login is mandatory).

Perhaps repair your client, and/or reset your computer? Otherwise, I can't really think of what else to do, other than maybe trying out the legacy client next time you log in and see if it happens there too. Maybe by logging into the legacy client once, and then returning to the new client, it will finally recognize that your present has been opened and won't bug you about it anymore. 

However, if it doesn't seem to go away, I would recommend sending in a bug report through the client with the little bug button at the bottom right of the client window so that they know about it.
I'm having the same issue, I only gifted one friend but it pops up every time I open the client. Been going on for about five days.
